WorkItem.Description:
Following scenario:
I use an existing Excel file as template and I populate it with values using a PHP script and PHPExcel.
For each sheet in my template file I defined a print area.
I have noticed that in the final file (the one populated with values) the print area is lost for the sheets which have spaces in their names.
Renaming the the sheet (e.g. underscore instead of space) solves the problem.
WorkItem.Summary: Print area is lost if sheet name contains spaces

Comments.Message: Have you got a sample PHP script (& its Excel file template associated) for tests ?
I'll prepare one test set for you in the next few days.
Please find attached a sample PHP file and a description about how to reproduce the bug.
